results.name: The Legend of Spyro: Dawn of the Dragon (DS)

requirements_en.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7 or later required
  • Processor: Intel Core i3 515 7U
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 1 GB AMD or NVIDIA Graphic Card
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
requirements_en.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 or Later
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 6600K
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 2 GB Nvidia GTX 970 Graphic Card
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 4 GB available space

requirements_en.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10(64bit)
  • Processor: Core i3 3GHz
  • Memory: ４ GB RAM
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Resolution: 1280x720
requirements_en.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
